fields.name: add-identifier
fields.description: Add a new identifier for the related person.
fields.note:
• Must not contain the use field.
  • Must contain the type, system, and value fields.
  • When specifying a period, the fields must include a time component with a timezone.

fields.name: test-identifier-id
fields.description: Test the value of the Identifier.id of the identifier at the given {index} in the list of related person identifiers.

fields.name: remove-identifier
fields.description: Remove the identifier at the given {index} in the list of related person identifiers.
fields.note: • Requires a test operation to be provided for the Identifier.id of the identifier intended to be removed.

fields.name: add-relationship
fields.description: The nature of the relationship between a patient and the related person.
fields.note:
• When specifying a period, the fields must include a time component with a timezone.
  • Duplicate relationships may be added, but will only be represented once on the Resource.
  • The coding field can contain codings from the standard or proprietary system, but not both.
  • Only one coding may be provided.

fields.name: test-relationship-id
fields.description: Test the Relationship.id value of the relationship at the given {index} in the list of related person relationships.

fields.name: remove-relationship
fields.description: Remove the relationship at the given {index} in the list of related person relationships.
fields.note: • Requires a test operation to be provided for the Relationship.id field of the relationship to be removed.

fields.name: replace-relationship-extension
fields.description: Replace the relationship extension field at the given {index}.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the Relationship.id of the relationship whose extension value is intended to be replaced.
  • When specifying a period, the fields must include a time component with a timezone.
  • When either start or end are not provided its value will be unset.
  • The coding field can contain codings from the standard or proprietary system, but not both.
  • Only one coding may be provided.
  • If either the valuePeriod and valueCodeableConcept are not provided, any existing values for the absent period and relation extensions will be removed.

fields.name: add-address
fields.description: Add a new address for the related person.
fields.note:
• Must not contain the text field.
  • Must contain the use field.
  • When specifying a period, the fields must include a time component with a timezone.
  • If line is provided, only the first four values are used. Additional values will be ignored.

fields.name: test-address-id
fields.description: Test the Address.id value of the address at the given {index} in the list of related person addresses.

fields.name: remove-address
fields.description: Remove the address at the given {index} in the list of related person addresses.
fields.note: • Requires a test operation to be provided for the Address.id field of the address to be removed.

fields.name: add-telecom
fields.description: Add a new contact detail for the related person.
fields.note:
• Must contain the system, use, and value fields.
  • When specifying a period, the fields must include a time component with a timezone.

fields.name: test-telecom-id
fields.description: Test the value of the ContactPoint.id of the telecom at the given {index} in the list of related person telecoms.

fields.name: remove-telecom
fields.description: Remove the telecom at the given {index} in the list of related person telecoms.
fields.note: • Requires a test operation to be provided for the ContactPoint.id of the telecom intended to be removed.

fields.name: test-name-id
fields.description: Test the value of the HumanName.id of the name at the given {index} in the list of related person names.
fields.note: • This operation is only supported for the first name in the list of related person names ({index} == 0).

fields.name: replace-name-family
fields.description: Replace the HumanName.family of the name at the given {index} in the list of related person names.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the HumanName.id of the name whose family is intended to be replaced.
  • This operation is only supported for the first name in the list of related person names ({index} == 0).

fields.name: replace-name-prefix
fields.description: Replace the HumanName.prefix of the name at the given {index} in the list of related person names.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the HumanName.id of the name whose prefix is intended to be replaced.
  • This operation is only supported for the first name in the list of related person names ({index} == 0).
  • If no prefix value is provided, the prefix on the name will be unset.
  • Only one prefix value may be provided.

fields.name: replace-name-given
fields.description: Replace the HumanName.given of the name at the given {index} in the list of related person names.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the HumanName.id of the name whose given is intended to be replaced.
  • This operation is only supported for the first name in the list of related person names ({index} == 0).
  • If there are fewer values provided than the HumanName.given list currently has, the additional existing values will be removed.
  • Up to two given names may be provided. If additional given names are required they must be provided in the second value as a single string separated by blank spaces.

fields.name: replace-name-suffix
fields.description: Replace the HumanName.suffix of the name at the given {index} in the list of related person names.
fields.note:
• Requires a test operation to be provided for the HumanName.id of the name whose suffix is intended to be replaced.
  • This operation is only supported for the first name in the list of related person names ({index} == 0).
  • If no suffix value is provided, the suffix on the name will be unset.
  • Only one suffix value may be provided.
